bibl.title: Decision Points in Past, Present, and Future New Testament Textual Criticism.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: Eldon Jay EPP and George W. MacRAE † (Edd.), The New Testament and Its Modern Interpreters (Philadelphia - Atlanta, Georgia, 1989) pp. 75-106, où l'article est intitulé: Textual Criticism.

bibl.title: Eldon Jay EPP and Gordon D. FEE, Studies in the Theory and Method of New Testament Textual Criticism

bibl.seg: EPP Eldon Jay, Decision Points in Past, Present, and Future New Testament Textual Criticism.
Eldon Jay EPP and Gordon D. FEE, Studies in the Theory and Method of New Testament Textual Criticism = Studies and Documents. 45 (Grand Rapids, Michigan, 1993) pp. 17-44.

Reproduit de: Eldon Jay EPP and George W. MacRAE † (Edd.), The New Testament and Its Modern Interpreters (Philadelphia - Atlanta, Georgia, 1989) pp. 75-106, où l'article est intitulé: Textual Criticism.
